mapper.select: select cart_idx, `name` p_name, id, TB_PRODUCT.serial_num, ea, price eaPrice, cart_date from TB_CART, TB_PRODUCT where TB_CART.serial_num = TB_PRODUCT.serial_num and id=#{id}
